attributes.action: british people have priority for volunteerial roles in 2012 olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the Olympics is a showcase for all that is good about our nation, we feel therefore that natural british people should be recognised and prioritised in the voluntary roles at the games. Therefore being recognised and rewarded as part of this great occasion.

rejection.details: The PM has no role in hiring staff for the Olympic games. Please contact LOCOG directly with your suggestion. http://www.london2012.com
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
